title: Super Fast Computers with New Materials
summary: Scientists have created a new material called 'gyromorphs' that can block light from all directions. This material mixes random parts like liquids with big patterns. It helps solve problems with older designs and could make computers much faster. Photonic computing uses light instead of electricity to process information, and this new material might make it work better. This is exciting because faster computers can help us do things like play games, learn, and solve big problems more quickly. Researchers are working hard to improve technology for the future.

background_read: Gyromorphs are new materials made by scientists that mix random, flowing parts with organized patterns to control light. This helps in photonic computing, which uses light to make computers faster and more efficient. Understanding materials and light can lead to better technology for everyday life.
Article_Structure: WHAT: Created gyromorphs to block light from all directions
WHY: To make computers faster and improve photonic computing
